name: What do you hear?? Yanny vs Laurel
name_original: What do you hear?? Yanny vs Laurel
description:
What do you hear?? Yanny vs Laurel - this is a game in which you need to understand what you hear! The game is constantly repeated the same word, but all people hear it differently. Someone hears the word "Yanny", others hear the word "Laurel". Smoothly move the slider from one side to the other side and discover how your brain adapts to different sound frequencies. What word or name do you hear, and how far do you have to move the slider to hear another? (The center point of the slider represents the original record.)

Key feature:
- You can surprise your friends and acquaintances!
- Cognitive game
- Beautiful design
- Achievements!
